body:
> and I get the following error: rtrace fatal: Unexpected EOF on input.


Are you sure that your view-file has the correct format? Maybe you first 
try it giving the views on the command-line as such:


vwrays -x 600 -y 600 -vp 0 0 0 -vd 1 0 0 | rcalc -e '$1=$1; $2=$2; 
$3=0.85; $4=$4; $5=$5; $6=1'


(Of course replacing my rather meaningless viewpoint/direction with yours)


CU Lars
___
